deliverSerial = #{deliverSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sib.warehouseSerial) FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '1' AND o.orderType != '委托采购' )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum};

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sib.warehouseSerial) FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum};

SELECT COUNT(o.serialNum) FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '1' AND o.orderType != '委托采购' )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum};

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT o.serialNum) FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum};

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT o.serialNum) FROM stockoutbatch sob LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sob.stockOutMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '1' AND o.orderType != '委托采购' )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT o.serialNum) FROM stockoutbatch sob LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sob.stockOutMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT MAX(s.stockDate) FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '1' AND o.orderType != '委托采购' )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum};

SELECT MAX(s.stockDate) FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum};

SELECT MAX(s.stockDate) FROM stockoutbatch sob LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sob.stockOutMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT SUM(a.outCount ) from ( SELECT DISTINCT sob.serialNum, sob.outCount FROM stockoutbatch sob LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sob.stockOutMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON d.serialNum = s.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})a

SELECT SUM(a.stockInCount ) from (SELECT DISTINCT sib.serialNum, sib.stockInCount
FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '1' AND o.orderType != '委托采购' )
WHERE stock.materielSerial = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})a

SELECT SUM(a.stockInCount ) from ( SELECT DISTINCT sib.serialNum, sib.stockInCount FROM stockInbatch sib LEFT JOIN deliveryMateriel dm ON dm.serialNum = sib.stockInMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN takeDelivery td ON td.serialNum = dm.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN delivery d ON d.serialNum = td.deliverSerial LEFT JOIN stockInOutRecord s ON td.serialNum = s.takeDeliverSerial LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.serialNum = dm.orderMaterielSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum = om.orderSerial LEFT JOIN stock stock ON stock.materielSerial = om.materielSerial AND ( stock.manageType = '2' AND o.orderType = '委托采购' AND stock.materielOwner = ( SELECT orderInfo.buyComId FROM orderInfo WHERE orderInfo.orderNum = o.orderSerial and orderInfo.delFlg = 0 limit 1 ) )
WHERE stock.serialNum = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR})a

select from stockInOutRecord sir where EXISTS (SELECT deliverSerial FROM (SELECT dm.deliverSerial from deliveryMateriel dm where EXISTS (select om.serialNum from orderMateriel om LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial where om.materielSerial= #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dm.orderMaterielSerial=om.serialNum and o.buyComId is NULL ))temp WHERE sir.deliverSerial= temp.deliverSerial ) AND sir.status=1

select from stockInOutRecord sir where EXISTS (SELECT deliverSerial FROM (SELECT dm.deliverSerial from deliveryMateriel dm where EXISTS (select om.serialNum from orderMateriel om LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial where om.materielSerial= #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dm.orderMaterielSerial=om.serialNum and o.buyComId is NOT NULL ))temp WHERE sir.deliverSerial= temp.deliverSerial) AND sir.status=1

select from stockInOutRecord sir where EXISTS (SELECT serialNum FROM ( SELECT td.serialNum FROM takeDelivery td WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT serialNum FROM ( SELECT d.serialNum FROM delivery d LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.orderSerial = d.orderSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial WHERE om.materielSerial = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.buyComId is NULL ) tb WHERE td.deliverSerial = tb.serialNum ) )temp where temp.serialNum=sir.takeDeliverSerial )AND sir.status=1

select from stockInOutRecord sir where EXISTS (SELECT serialNum FROM ( SELECT td.serialNum FROM takeDelivery td WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT serialNum FROM ( SELECT d.serialNum FROM delivery d LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.orderSerial = d.orderSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial WHERE om.materielSerial = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.buyComId is NOT NULL ) tb WHERE td.deliverSerial = tb.serialNum ) )temp where temp.serialNum=sir.takeDeliverSerial )AND sir.status=1

SELECT d.serialNum FROM delivery d LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.orderSerial = d.orderSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial WHERE om.materielSerial = #{materielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.buyComId is NOT NULL

SELECT d.serialNum FROM delivery d LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.orderSerial = d.orderSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial WHERE om.materielSerial = #{materielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.buyComId=#{materielOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT td.serialNum from takeDelivery td where EXISTS( SELECT serialNum from(SELECT d.serialNum FROM delivery d LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.orderSerial = d.orderSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial WHERE om.materielSerial = #{materielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.buyComId is NULL )temp where temp.serialNum= td.deliverSerial )

SELECT td.serialNum from takeDelivery td where EXISTS( SELECT serialNum from(SELECT d.serialNum FROM delivery d LEFT JOIN orderMateriel om ON om.orderSerial = d.orderSerial LEFT JOIN orderInfo o ON o.serialNum=om.orderSerial WHERE om.materielSerial = #{materielSerial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and o.buyComId=#{materielOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR})temp where temp.serialNum= td.deliverSerial )
